titles.title: Highway Trust Fund Recovery Act of 2003
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to transfer all excise taxes imposed on alcohol fuels to the Highway Trust Fund, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 7/25/2003--Introduced. Highway Trust Fund Recovery Act of 2003 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to transfer all excise taxes imposed on alcohol fuels to the Highway Trust Fund.
